channel.title: UserFlows
channel.description: Generate flow diagrams from Artboards in Sketch

item.title: UserFlows 2.3.9
item.description: • Sketch 81+ Compatibility.

item.title: UserFlows 2.3.7
item.description:
• Sketch 71 Compatibility.
  • Added option to not number artboards when generating a flow diagram.

item.title: UserFlows 2.3.6
item.description: • Sketch 67 Compatibility.

item.title: UserFlows 2.3.5
item.description: • Sketch 53.2 Compatibility.

item.title: UserFlows 2.3.4
item.description: • Sketch 53.1 Compatibility.

item.title: UserFlows 2.3.3
item.description:
• Sketch 53 Compatibility.
  • Updating a diagram no longer adds additional export options.

item.title: UserFlows 2.3.2
item.description:
• Fixed an issue where `Update Flow` would delete the old artboard and create a new artboard.
  • Updated missing items in localization files and added English backup localization errors.

item.title: UserFlows 2.3.1
item.description: • More Sketch 52 Compatibility fixes

item.title: UserFlows 2.3
item.description:
• Sketch 52 Compatibility
  • Minor bug fixes

item.title: UserFlows 2.2.1
item.description:
• Use shared styles for link borders
  • Minor bug fixes

item.title: UserFlows 2.2
item.description: • Apply Shared Layer Styles to Connection layers

item.title: UserFlows 2.1.4
item.description:
• Leverage the new stroke arrows available in Sketch 51
  • Use shared layer styles for connection lines

item.title: UserFlows 2.1.3
item.description: • Fixes for Sketch 50

item.title: UserFlows 2.1.2
item.description:
• Added artboard magnets
  • Fixed `newPageTitle` bug
  • Simplified export options

item.title: UserFlows 2.1.1
item.description: • Added the ability to update an exported flow diagram.

item.title: UserFlows 2.1
item.description:
• Include native Sketch Prototype flow connections in generated diagrams.
  • Auto-redraw connections on layers moved (experimental)

item.title: UserFlows 2.0.8
item.description:
• Fixes for Sketch 48.
  • Changed `Create Link` shortcut from (Cmd Shift K) to (Cmd Shift M) to avoid clashing with a new native shortcut.

item.title: UserFlows 2.0.7
item.description:
• Fixes for Sketch 47 and High Sierra.
  • Added ability to remove all links from an Artboard or Page.
  • Added option for generating flows at 1x but with retina images.
  • Added option to customize the font size of Condition labels.
  • Added support for Spanish (by @AlvYuste) and Italian (by @KingFelix)

item.title: UserFlows 2.0.6
item.description: • Minor bug fix for older documents

item.title: UserFlows 2.0.5
item.description: • Fixes for Sketch 45
